Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: sashelle70
Reviews.Content: I love this camera but the battery life sucks. Picture and video quality are great. I also liked the accessories as well.

Reviews.Title: my husband dropped my camera so I replaced with this one
Reviews.Author: sandy
Reviews.Content: the extras were great and the camera is a cannon so what could be wrong I would  suggest this  to any one  who needs a point and shoot camera.the pictures are alot better than my old camera took  so i should thank my husband for dropping my old one

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: J belladonna
Reviews.Content: gave as a gift - recipient is very happy with it - clear photos, size makes it always available,chosen based on results a friend is always sending me from the same model of camera.Good price with complete package of necessary accessories.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: paula l. mcintosh
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a good user friendly camera for first timer and I found it. It is so small and easy to use and came with a lot ofextras. I love my powershot and would recommend and buy another higher grade camera in the future when I am ready. Packed and received in excellent condition.

Reviews.Title: Fine Camera, Handy Kit
Reviews.Author: D. H. Murray
Reviews.Content: The  Cannon PowerShot Elph 110 is the best little point-and-shoot camera I have seen or used. It takes excellent pictures and very good video. I love using a DSLR camera and making adjustments, but they are bigger and harder to carry around. The Elph 110 is an amazing replacement and can do quite a bit more than I would expect from a point and shoot. This is my second one of these and I am giving my older one to a friend. I carry this camera everywhere and I find battery life is excellent. That said, I keep 3 or 4 extra batteries handy, as well as SD cards. I use the fastest cards they make because I like to shoot in burst mode.

Reviews.Title: Canon never lets you down
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey E. Strozyk
Reviews.Content: Camera works great....lightweight, compact...reasonable price.  Go ahead and order it...takes great pictures.  You cant beat Canon Cameras,  I have several.....this one is great for traveling.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS
Reviews.Author: Connie Chapman
Reviews.Content: Was very pleased with my purchase.  The extra battery was a plus.  Not much of a warning when the battery is low so always have the extra battery on hand and charged.  Very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Spare Battery did not fit the camera
Reviews.Author: Joel Baumann
Reviews.Content: Camera is OK the package sucked as it had the wrong spare battery. I didn't see this until we tried to use it six months later. Always check your order thoroughly.

Additional NB-11L Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery - Package of LCD Screen Protectors
Compact Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pocket and Strap - Lens Care and Cleaning Kit
Flexible Legged Mini Tripod - BONUS!! HDMI cable for High-Definition TV Connection - FREE 25 Quality Prints (promo code# on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS 16.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom 24mm Wide-Angle Lens and 1080p Full HD Video Recording (Silver) + NB-11L Battery + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
